meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ungrateful.
meanings.sent1: Her ungratefulness towards her parents was evident when she refused to thank them for the birthday gift.
meanings.sent2: His ungratefulness for all the help he received left everyone feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent3: The ungratefulness of the cat towards its owner was shown by ignoring the freshly filled food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The ungratefulness of the student towards the teacher was like a dark cloud overshadowing the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The ungratefulness of the customer towards the waiter was so palpable, it made the atmosphere tense.

meanings.sent1: The ungratefulness of the child towards his grandmother's gift was hurtful.
meanings.sent2: She showed her ungratefulness by never saying thank you for all the favors done for her.
meanings.sent3: The ungratefulness of the dog towards the new toy was comical as it preferred an old sock instead.
meanings.sent4: The ungratefulness of the city towards its historical buildings was like erasing its own past.
meanings.sent5: The ungratefulness of the student towards the scholarship he received was shocking to everyone.

meanings.sent1: His ungratefulness towards his mentor was disappointing after all the guidance provided.
meanings.sent2: The ungratefulness of the employee towards the promotion offered was surprising.
meanings.sent3: The ungratefulness of the plant towards the sunlight was evident as it withered away.
meanings.sent4: The ungratefulness of the guest towards the hospitality shown was like a slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The ungratefulness of the student towards the opportunity given was a missed chance for growth.
